data.system_settings: iOS 9.3.5 on iPad 4th gen with Discord v1.8.7
data.actual_result: Link stays as normal and can be tapped as though it exists although messages dont load at the said channel.
data.short_description: Hidden channels which are still linked in a public channel can be tapped as though it exists
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a channel in a server. - Get someone to post a link to it. - Make the channel hidden to everyone. - As a non admin user, find the posted link to the now hidden channel.
